page.title: 11The Priory, Britwell
page.content: Mrs Roadnight has lived at the Priory which is the headquarters of the six farms on the 2000 acre estat, for 49 years. The estate has a 1000 acres of cereal which are mainly heat and baley. They grow 4603 tons of grain a year. They also grow 4603 tons of grain a year. They also grow oil seed rape and rye grass. Mrs Roadnight has 550 breding sows and 120 sheep. Each sow produces a litter of about eight piglets twice a year. The pigs eat grass cereal an sow biscuits. About Â£1/4 million is spent on pig food a year. Eihteen people are employed fall time on the farm. At harvest time six extra students are employed because it is the busiest time of the year.
